title: Bug 3666 - Hungry code assist eating too much code
OB:
The code is changed to: baz(x.foo().foo())

I would rather it gave me: baz(x.foo()x.foo())
EB: The code assist feature should provide suggestions without eating the code. Specifically, it should not remove the code after the first 'x.' when suggesting 'foo()' for 'baz' call in 'bar' method.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Change the 'baz' call to: baz(x.x.foo())
2. Place the cursor after the first 'x.'
3. Press Ctrl+Space to bring up the code assist
4. Type 'f' to filter the list
5. Select 'foo()'
